description:
Evening program:

Ronald Guiot, Sommelier and manager of La Vinerie will guide us through the evening.

20h30: one glass of spanish Cava as "Welcome glass", with a short explanation about the utility of bubbles to prepare your mouth before a tasting

21h-22h00:

- Introduction to the Visual approach and blind test with 3 wines "Can you recognize the red, the white and the rose?"

-Introduction to the smell approach and one smell exercise around 8 different flavours

- Introduction to the taste approach and one tasting of 3 different red wines, with explanations of the different grapes, geologies, climates, ... and all informations able to help you to identify the wines

22h-22h30: Open bar.

If someone want to buy a bottle and to drink it on the place, possibility to pay the price of the bottle plus 5 euros as "Droit de bouchon" Maximum

22h45: end of the activity

Price: 20 euros pp or 25 euros with 4 different sort of toastes (2 cheeses and 2 charcuteries)

Please let me know your choice in advance.
name: Wine tasting at La Vinerie

description: Let's taste some excellent wines at Oeno tk winebar. It is located in Chatelain area.

description:
This Saturday we will tast a nice selection of some excellent Italian wines (sparkling, white and red) in this enotica in Leuven.

We can meet before and have a little walk in the beautiful historic center of Leuven at 2pm (we meet at the obelisk in front of the trainstation). Please let me know who wants to participate. Otherwise we meet directly in the enoteca at 3pm.

Please change your rsvp in time if you do not intend to come as places are reserved. I agreed with the owner that payment will be individually made before the start.

Price is 25 euros.

 

See you all on Saturday!
how_to_find_us: at 2pm at the obelisk in front of the trainstation (Martelarenplein) or 3pm inside the enoteca

description:
Let's meet up there and enjoy some good wine...

The Adegga Wine Market arrives in Brussels ! November 16th , Adegga gather producers from all over Europe at The Hotel in Brussels giving the opportunity to people to discover , taste and acquire exceptional wines . Wineries have been selected for their unique approach to viticulture and the quality of their wines. The vast majority of wines will be presented the producers themselves. 
Montirius 
Champagne Françoise Bedel 
Niepoort 
Chateau de Miniere 
Casa da Passarella 
Miss Vicky Wine 
João Barbosa 
Casa de Mouraz 
Damasceno 
Vale da Capucha / Pynga 
Quinta da Aveleda 
Cast Gonçalvinho 
Casa de Darei 
Quinta de Lemos 
Kopke 
Burmester 
Barros 
João Portugal Ramos 
Ivo vinya 
Torre do Frade 
Chateau de Castigno 
Julia Kemper 
Casa de Cello 
Dona Maria 
Herdade do Cebolal 
Negreiros

** The Port Wine Experience ** 
A unique opportunity to taste rare and old Port wines. Local expert Kris Van de Sompel will be on hand to guide you through the tasting. This tasting has limited availability. Please sign up early. The Port Wine Experience Ticket gives combined access to this tasting room and the Brussels Wine Market 2013.

1 . Niepoort Garrafeira 1952 
2 . Niepoort Colheita 1957 
3 . Niepoort Garrafeira 1977 
4 . Niepoort LBV 1981 
5. Niepoort Vintage 2005 
6 . Niepoort Colheita 2005 
7 . Niepoort LBV 2009 
8 . Niepoort Vintage 2011 
9 . Niepoort 30 Year Old Tawny 
10 . Niepoort 10 Year Old Tawny White

** Purchase your tickets here**  https://brusselswinemarket2013.eventbrite.com  


- Online Pre-event sales (closes 15th Nov): 8 euro 
- Online Group ticket (for up to 5 people): 35 euro 
- At the door of the event: 10 euro 
- The Port Wine Experience ticket: 35 euro (includes entrance to the tasting room to taste range of rare and old Port wines and entrance to the Brussels Wine Market) 

Official event website: 

http://www.adegga.com/winemarket/brussels2013/  

Facebook event page: 

https://www.facebook.com/events/382778921829664/  


** Information ** 
Opening hours: 11am to 6pm. 
Location: The Hotel - Boulevard de Waterloo 38, 1000 Brussels  


** Contact us ** 
For any information please email us at: [masked]

name: Australian winetasting

description:
Yes, its finally happening, there have been many requests for a South African wine tasting - its here! 

We will be tasting 5 different South African wines, 2 whites and 3 reds, including at least one but probably two of the unique South African Pinotage varietal. 

This South African wine tasting will focus on two Cultivars, the Chenin Blanc and the uniquely South African Pinotage with a spot of Shiraz for some variation. Pinotage is a uniquely South African grape variety. Pinotage was bred in 1925 as a cross between Pinot noir and Cinsaut (Cinsaut was known as "Hermitage" in South Africa during that time, hence the name of Pinotage).

Tasting List:

1)  Beaumont Wines

a)  Chenin Blanc, 2013


b)  Hope Marguerite Chenin Blanc, 2012


2)  Graham Beck

a)  Shiraz, 2004


3)  Diemersfontein Wines

a)  Diemersfontein Pinotage, 2012


b)  Diemersfontein Carpe Diem Pinotage, 2011


We will definitely have some "local is lekker" snacks to go with the wines. 

It will cost 25 euro pp. 

The venue will be close to Parc Royal, Brussels. We will notify those that have RSVP'ed the address of the venue.
name: South African winetasting

name: Pepete&Ronron

description:
Wine Not invites us for their annual Spring tasting:

On the menu:

Avec la présence appréciée des Domaines :
Marcel Deiss et ses vins d'Alsace toujours aussi surprenants et captivants issus d'assemblage
Pascal Lambert et ses vins de Chinon... et il n'y aura pas que du rouge!... ses Chinon Blancs (100 % Chenin) sont remarquables
La nouveauté du moment chez Wine-Not se trouve en Jurançon. Le très réputé Domaine Cauhapé avec ses Jurançon secs et moelleux vous dira tout sur le cépage Manseng
Le driving wine maker Hervé Chabert présentera plusieurs Cuvées du Languedoc, de Château Pech Redon à Ribiera, en passant par Emile et Rose et Clos Mathélisse (là aussi c'est nouveau… une vraie pépite !) Et que du Naturel !!!
Alain Cavaillès avec ses Bulles de Limoux continuera de vous réconcilier avec les bulles du Languedoc
L'autre Costières de Nîmes chez Wine-Not c'est Château D'Or et de Gueules, présent pour la première fois. Des vins gourmands...
Fanny Croisy nous montrera l'excellente progression des vins du Château La Mascaronne, valeur montante de La Provence, et avec une petite surprise de la région...

We will meet in front of Wine Not a bit before 2 PM. People who are late can find us inside 

Tasting is free of charge
name: Spring tasting @ Wine Not

On the program:

19h30: bubbels and zakouskis

20h: start of the battle

6 battles (blind tasting of two different wines, most votes win):

1. French bubbels against ...,

2-3. White wine battles (for example French Chardonnay against Argentinean one)

4-5-6. Red wine battles

At the end of the battles the winner will be France or ..the world

description:
After a very succesful first winebattle we are continuing with a slightly changed concept due to the inglorious defeat of France last time :-)

We will tasting Shiraz (Syrah), Merlot, Cabernet and Pinot from different regions in the World. At the end of each round we can vote which variety of the grape we like more (the French Merlot or the Argentinean for example).

program:

• Syrah battle

• Merlot Battle

• Cabernet battle

• Pinot-pinotage battle

At the end you will know whether you like more Merlot, Shiraz, Cabernet, or Pinot and you will be able to find wines more easily in the supermarket.

The evening will be presented by Ronald Guiot from La Vinerie.

 

Prepayment is necessary: payment details provided when rsvp'ing
name: Winebattle 2: Are you more Syrah, Merlot,Cabernet or Pinot?

description:
Tuscany is coming to the Arsenal in Brussels for a unique event with an early autumn festival of Tuscan tastes and flavours.

Saveurs Toscanes will be an ideal opportunity for visitors to plunge into the region’s typical, unique way of life, with more than 50 exhibitors, especially here for the occasion.

The festival highlights bringing visitors together to meet
and talk with some of the best, most exclusive food and wine producers in the region, through a sensory
journey of savours and delights.

There will be culinary demonstrations, conferences, workshops; wine tastings given by oenologists, food tastings ..


More info on this year's edition: http://saveurstoscanes.be/

How to get there:

Tram 7 – Arrêt Arsenal
Métro Pétillon
Gare d’Etterbeek Tickets 12 euros (can be bought online in advance on their website)

 Price 12 euros
name: Saveurs Toscane 2014 @ l'Arsenal

description:

There will also be a short surprise concert (something funky ;-)

I hope to see you all there so we can share a glass and make a toast!

Address: I reserved a place above a restaurant in St Catherine (metro St Catherine) for us (address to be given to confirmed rsvp's)

description:
Discover a hidden secret of Slovenian wine brought to you by a group of young Slovenian wine lovers.

We will taste some unique white and red wines, trendy orange wine as well as global classics, all produced in Slovenia.  A young sommelier running his own wine bank back in Slovenia will take us through the tastes and stories of our glasses. The wine list will be posted shortly. 

Tasting will be around Chatelain. Adress only to be given to confirmed RSVP's.

This is a prepaid event. To reduce the amount of administration I would like to ask you to RSVP only when you do the payment. Non confirmed RSVP's (no payment) will be moved automatically to "not going status". Payment details when RSVP'in yes.

Thx a lot to Martina for hosting this event!!

description:
Hello Winelovers,

A lot of new wineplaces are popping up recently. A very nice authentic one just opened next to Place Luxembourg.

The owner "Zag" will host a special evening for us with some of his favorite wines together with some fingerfood.

Hope to see you all there!

This is a prepaid event. To reduce the amount of administration I would like to ask you to RSVP only when you do the payment. Non confirmed RSVP's (no payment) will be moved automatically to "not going status". Payment details when RSVP'in yes.
